review: This game...It will make you laughIt will make you cryAnd it will mess with your head
I played this so that if i ever go back in time and meet my teenaged self I can say 'I played Duke Nukem Forever'
15860 backers on Indiegogo can't be wrong!
A nice MOBA for beginners with a very colourful cast of characters.
This game is weird! However, the ending was quite nice.
I forgot how much this game used to scare me...
I attached rockets to a train and made it fly! What more could you want?
